sentences.en: Both men are grumpy, but both reckon they will cope.
sentences.cn: 这两人都性情乖戾, 但都认为他们会合作.

sentences.en: China has been a grumpy taker in this process.
sentences.cn: 在这个过程中,中国的态度并不友善.

sentences.en: Don't be so grumpy and cynical about it.
sentences.cn: 不要为此这么生气,这么愤世嫉俗.

sentences.en: Don't be so grumpy and pessimistic every cloud has a silver lining.
sentences.cn: 不要这么暴躁和悲观,事情也有好的一面.

sentences.en: Eisenhower, clod and grumpy, said, " Well, I thought you should have done this a long time ago. "
sentences.cn: 艾森豪威尔冷淡而粗暴地说: “ 唔, 我认为你早就应该这样做了. ”

sentences.en: I don't know. Parisians can be grumpy. Have you noticed?
sentences.cn: 我也不知道, 巴黎人的脾气可不好, 你发现了 吗 ?

sentences.en: In this grumpy repression hatred finds an excellent breeding ground.
sentences.cn: 在这个粗暴的压制里,仇恨找到了发芽的好地方.

sentences.en: Maybe I'm just being old and grumpy and pessimistic.
sentences.cn: 也许是我人老了牢骚多,想法悲观.

sentences.en: Mina’s always a bit grumpy first thing in the morning.
sentences.cn: 明娜早上起来总是有点脾气。

sentences.en: She understands why I get tired and grumpy.
sentences.cn: 她理解我为什么累、为什么爱发火。

sentences.en: She's very grumpy when her tooth aches.
Some folk think I'm a grumpy old man.
sentences.cn: 有些人认为我是个性情暴躁的老头。

sentences.en: Staggering around, can't open your eyes properly , disorientated, grumpy.
sentences.cn: 到处蹒跚 、 睁眼不能 、 不知所措 、 脾气暴躁.

sentences.en: The grumpy man found fault with everything.
sentences.cn: 那个性情乖戾的人对什么事都要找岔.

sentences.en: The tests show you have an overactive grumpy gene.
sentences.cn: 测试显示你的暴躁基因过于活跃.

sentences.en: You shouldn't be so grumpy to someone who's new in the neighborhood.
sentences.cn: 你不应该对新来的邻居这么粗暴.

words.tran_cn: 爱抱怨的人；发牢骚的人
一阵坏脾气；发火；闹情绪
脾气暴躁的；性情乖戾的
脾气坏的人；爱抱怨的人

trans.tran_cn: 脾气坏的，性情粗暴的，脾气暴躁的，性情乖戾的
脾气坏的人；爱抱怨的人
